alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Martin County through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Nettles Island to near Port Salerno to 7 miles east of Indiantown. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jupiter, Stuart, Jupiter Island, Hobe Sound and Port Salerno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
